scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/sandbox/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/sandbox
  set jcr:title{String} to "Sandbox Demo Project"
end

set ACL for sandbox-read-service-user
  allow jcr:read on /content/dam/sandbox
  allow jcr:read on /conf/sandbox/settings/dam/cfm/models
end

set ACL for sandbox-write-service-user
  allow jcr:read,jcr:versionManagement,rep:write,crx:replicate,jcr:lockManagement on /content/dam/sandbox
end
